name: Fortnova
overview:
Fortnova (TM) is a system security management startup based on the foundation of Open Security Initiative, providing software tools and intelligence services for IT administrators and computer users to stay ahead of any mal-ware intrusion.

Fortnovaâ€™s first product is Fortnova Security Camera, a GUI tool that allows its users to take snapshots of a computer system and compare snapshots at two points of time for changes. By providing knowledge of changes at the time when the knowledge is needed, the tool saves time for IT administrators that would otherwise be needed for investigation. Facing mounting security issues, the tool helps people to get back the control of their computer systems by pinpointing what and where unwanted changes are.

Open Security (TM) is a new initiative for software industry to address security issues in a community fashion. It advocates proactive and verifiable security claims from software publishers in order to weed out mal-ware intrusions. Fortnova is the thought leader of Open Security Initiative.
